unnormalised: Cybersecurity firm Quick Heal reported a surge of 70% in ransomware attacks targeting Indian SMEs in Q3 2024. Apparently, hackers are increasingly going after smaller companies, 'cause they often don't have the fancy security systems of the big guys. Expect more phishing emails, especially during Diwali season when everyone's expecting bonus announcements – a perfect time for scams, said Mr. Sharma, CEO of Quick Heal.
